results.content:
There are many Vue+Laravel courses on Udemy, but only few of them cover so many topics. Adding that, Antonio packed those topics in only 7.5 hourse. How can it be even possible!?
Although this course is already great, had it included Laravel testing topic, it would've been even greater. 
As far as I know, few materials(regardless of online or offline) cover Laravel API testing. I think there lies a hidden demand. 
I hope Antinio will create Laravel API course which includes testing topics sometime.

user.title: 一日二食 お昼は絶食
user.name: 一日二食
